<a id="SceneReplicationConfig"></a>

# SceneReplicationConfig

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Configuration for properties to synchronize with a [MultiplayerSynchronizer](MultiplayerSynchronizer.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_SceneReplicationConfig_ReplicationMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **ReplicationMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_SceneReplicationConfig_ReplicationMode)

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_constant_REPLICATION_MODE_NEVER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ReplicationMode](SceneReplicationConfig.md#enum_SceneReplicationConfig_ReplicationMode) **REPLICATION_MODE_NEVER** = `0`

Do not keep the given property synchronized.<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_constant_REPLICATION_MODE_ALWAYS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ReplicationMode](SceneReplicationConfig.md#enum_SceneReplicationConfig_ReplicationMode) **REPLICATION_MODE_ALWAYS** = `1`

Replicate the given property on process by constantly sending updates using unreliable transfer mode.<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_constant_REPLICATION_MODE_ON_CHANGE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ReplicationMode](SceneReplicationConfig.md#enum_SceneReplicationConfig_ReplicationMode) **REPLICATION_MODE_ON_CHANGE** = `2`

Replicate the given property on process by sending updates using reliable transfer mode when its value changes.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_add_property"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_property**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md), index\: [int](int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_add_property)

Adds the property identified by the given `path` to the list of the properties being synchronized, optionally passing an `index`.

\ **Note:** For details on restrictions and limitations on property synchronization, see [MultiplayerSynchronizer](MultiplayerSynchronizer.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_get_properties"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[NodePath](NodePath.md)\] **get_properties**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_get_properties)

Returns a list of synchronized property [NodePath](NodePath.md)\\ s.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_has_property"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_property**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_has_property)

Returns ``true`` if the given `path` is configured for synchronization.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **property_get_index**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_index)

Finds the index of the given `path`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_replication_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[ReplicationMode](SceneReplicationConfig.md#enum_SceneReplicationConfig_ReplicationMode) **property_get_replication_mode**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_replication_mode)

Returns the replication mode for the property identified by the given `path`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_spawn"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **property_get_spawn**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_spawn)

Returns ``true`` if the property identified by the given `path` is configured to be synchronized on spawn.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_sync"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **property_get_sync**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_sync)

**Deprecated:** Use [property_get_replication_mode()](SceneReplicationConfig.md#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_replication_mode) instead.

Returns ``true`` if the property identified by the given `path` is configured to be synchronized on process.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_watch"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **property_get_watch**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_watch)

**Deprecated:** Use [property_get_replication_mode()](SceneReplicationConfig.md#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_get_replication_mode) instead.

Returns ``true`` if the property identified by the given `path` is configured to be reliably synchronized when changes are detected on process.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_replication_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **property_set_replication_mode**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md), mode\: [ReplicationMode](SceneReplicationConfig.md#enum_SceneReplicationConfig_ReplicationMode)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_replication_mode)

Sets the synchronization mode for the property identified by the given `path`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_spawn"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **property_set_spawn**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md), enabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_spawn)

Sets whether the property identified by the given `path` is configured to be synchronized on spawn.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_sync"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **property_set_sync**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md), enabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_sync)

**Deprecated:** Use [property_set_replication_mode()](SceneReplicationConfig.md#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_replication_mode) with [REPLICATION_MODE_ALWAYS](SceneReplicationConfig.md#SceneReplicationConfig_constant_REPLICATION_MODE_ALWAYS) instead.

Sets whether the property identified by the given `path` is configured to be synchronized on process.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_watch"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **property_set_watch**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md), enabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_watch)

**Deprecated:** Use [property_set_replication_mode()](SceneReplicationConfig.md#SceneReplicationConfig_method_property_set_replication_mode) with [REPLICATION_MODE_ON_CHANGE](SceneReplicationConfig.md#SceneReplicationConfig_constant_REPLICATION_MODE_ON_CHANGE) instead.

Sets whether the property identified by the given `path` is configured to be reliably synchronized when changes are detected on process.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SceneReplicationConfig_method_remove_property"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_property**\ (\ path\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SceneReplicationConfig_method_remove_property)

Removes the property identified by the given `path` from the configuration.
